title: How to get a S?
body: What criteria do i need to get a S in a match

replies.body: 20/0/70 600 CS, 7000k damage dealt, 200 wards placed, 80 turrets destroyed.
Changes from champion to champion and role to role...

Like Rougestoney pointed out, there isn't a set criteria you need to achieve. For good reason too, can you imagine games where people are completely ignoring their teams just so they can get x farm, x objective assists and eventually x/x/x KDA? 

In the end, the grade you receive is based on the[ **same champ** in the **same role**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery) compared to everyone else on the server. You have to be in the top x% of players playing whichever champion in whichever role (they treat annie mid and annie support differently for example) 

The grade boundaries are bound to change slightly every day, depending on how players are doing with the champs. From what I can remember, Ashe and Garen are pretty easy to get S ranks on, as a lot of beginners play them (and do bad), eventually lowering the grade.

For KDA It varies from champ but you need to be in at least 40% kill participation, for cs you need at least 75 per 10 min and for objectives you need to be involved in 50%. That's all I know for solo laners and adc. For support you need at least 10cs per 10 min, have 60% kill participation and be involved in 50% of objectives. For Junglers you need 50cs per 10 min 50% kill paritipation and 50% onjectuve participation. I'm pretty sure thats the crit for roles, but for individual champs it's different becuase they take in things like damage done, damage taken, ect.
